pie_de_pagina.unirse: Join our group of strategic partners

inicio.titulo: Leading distributor of the best technology and appliance brands
inicio.subtitulo: Specialists in offline and online channels, we provide exceptional experiences in prices and products.
inicio.descripcion: Space Brands is a leader in the distribution of technology and appliances in LATAM, with a staff of 10 years of experience in Retail. We connect leading brands with retailers and marketplaces, managing a portfolio of over 500 products.

elementos.descripcion: We integrate online and offline channels to maximize the impact of our brands, consolidating a network with more than 15 partnerships in retailers and marketplaces.
We collaborate with technology leaders, managing more than 500 SKUs. We project 2,500 monthly transactions by 2025, optimizing deliveries and customer experience.
We are ready to expand in the region, backed by a solid network of contacts. Our product adaptation model positions us as leaders in the development of customized OEM solutions.
We apply strategic investments that ensure competitive prices and an annual growth rate of 15% APR for our partners and investors.

servicios.descripcion: We develop high-performance technology products, designed and adapted to the local market from concept to implementation.

elementos.descripcion: 50 sales and dropshipping specialists, both direct and indirect, drive the visibility of our brands, maximizing SKU rotation.
We manage over 300 points of sale with advanced tools. Our aggressive ad campaigns increase traffic and conversions, optimizing brand positioning and merchandise rotation.
We offer efficient technical support across the country through our network of authorized professionals, achieving 97% customer satisfaction and ensuring fast response times.

socios.descripcion: We collaborate with more than 30 retailers and/or marketplaces, ensuring comprehensive distribution and strong presence in the main sales channels.
socios.descripcion_footer: Our distribution capacity guarantees the presence of our products on the most important online platforms in the region.

cobertura.descripcion: We guarantee efficient and timely distribution in more than 300 direct and indirect physical points of sale throughout Peru, ensuring a comprehensive service that optimizes time and costs. Our logistics strategy covers 100% of the national territory.

cards.title: 2024.Q4
cards.content: Implementation of a new application to optimize catalog management in marketplaces such as Ripley, Falabella, and Mercado Libre, with the Hot Prices platform.

cards.title: 2025.Q1
cards.header: Expansion of the Offline Distribution Network
cards.content: Incorporation of new regional distributors in the northern and central regions of the country.

cards.title: 2025.Q2
cards.content: Expansion of the Hot Prices platform to Bolivia.

cards.title: 2025.Q3
cards.content: Implementation of an advanced data-driven logistics solution to improve delivery times and reduce costs by 20%.
cards.footer: Real-time logistics in Peru and Bolivia

cards.title: 2025.Q4
cards.content: Creation of customized products under the Space Brands label in partnership with OEM manufacturers.

cards.title: 2026.Q1
cards.content: Expansion of product presence in physical stores in department stores and supermarkets in Peru and Bolivia.

cards.title: 2026.Q3
cards.header: Total Online and Offline Operations Integration
cards.content: Unification of the management platform to control online and physical sales in real-time.

cards.title: 2027.Q1
cards.content: Launch of an e-commerce platform for the ecosystem of brands for the direct sale of products represented by Space Brands.

cards.title: 2027.Q3
cards.header: Expansion into New Latin American Markets
cards.content: Entry into Colombia and Chile with a comprehensive distribution offering.

tecnologia.descripcion: Our commitment to technology and innovation allows us to manage more than 60,000 annual transactions. With plans to double our installed capacity by 2026, we employ advanced data analysis tools to optimize inventories, logistics, and sales, improving the customer experience and maximizing operational efficiency.

elementos.descripcion: Our decisions, backed by data, optimize inventory rotation and refine product management.
We implement automation in shipments, prices, and catalogs in major marketplaces, reducing human errors by 90%.
